Type.Name: Void

TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential sealed serializable Void extends System.ValueType
.class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit void extends System.ValueType

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

remarks.para: The structure is used in the namespace, but is rarely useful in a typical application. The structure has no members other than the ones all types inherit from the class.

summary.para: Specifies a return value type for a method that does not return a value.
